content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-13.5, 20.0)
Consists of boiler (position -13.5, 20.0) and offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5).

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of lab (position -17.5, 23.5).

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to power connections
- Ensure that entities such as labs and assembling machines are within the power range of electric poles. If they are too far, consider relocating them closer to a power source.

### Errors when placing electric poles
- Ensure there is a clear space at the target location before attempting to place an electric pole. If there is an existing object in the way, relocate the object or choose a different position for the pole.

### General placement errors
- Always check the surrounding area for existing entities before placing new structures to avoid placement failures.
